spark.sql(f"""CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE crm_sanctioneddb.dim_calendar
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://{fabric_workspace}@onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/crm_sanctioneddb.Lakehouse/Tables/dim_calendar'
AS
WITH date_range AS (
    SELECT EXPLODE(SEQUENCE(TO_DATE('2012-01-01'), TO_DATE('2026-12-31'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)) AS CalendarDate
),
date_attributes AS (
    SELECT
        CalendarDate,
        --DATE_FORMAT(CalendarDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS DayOfWeek,
        DAYOFWEEK(CalendarDate) AS DayOfWeek,
        DAY(CalendarDate) AS DayOfMonth,
        FLOOR((DAY(CalendarDate) - 1) / 7) + 1 AS WeekOfMonth,
        WEEKOFYEAR(CalendarDate) AS WeekOfYear,
        MONTH(CalendarDate) AS MonthOfYear,
        QUARTER(CalendarDate) AS QuarterOfYear,
        --CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(CalendarDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') IN ('1', '7') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IsWeekend,
        CASE WHEN DAYOFWEEK(CalendarDate) IN (1, 7) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IsWeekend,
        DATE_FORMAT(CalendarDate, 'EEEE') AS DayOfWeekName,
        DATE_FORMAT(CalendarDate, 'MMMM') AS MonthName
    FROM date_range
)
SELECT
    CAST(CalendarDate as DATE),
    CAST(DayOfWeek AS INT),
    CAST(DayOfMonth AS INT),
    CAST(WeekOfMonth AS INT),
    CAST(WeekOfYear AS INT),
    CAST(MonthOfYear AS INT),
    CAST(QuarterOfYear AS INT),
    CAST(DayOfWeekName AS STRING),
    CAST(MonthName AS STRING),
    CAST(IsWeekend AS STRING)
FROM date_attributes;
